events.message: I want to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am dissatisfied with the purchase.
Automatically classified the customer's inquiry under the refund cluster based on keywords indicating return and money back requests.
The refund support specialist has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request to ensure timely processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I’m here to help you with your refund request and will guide you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that we can verify the details and proceed accordingly?
My order number is 123456789. I am requesting a refund because the item arrived damaged and not as described on the website, which is disappointing.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We can initiate a full refund once we receive the returned product. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for providing the return label. I appreciate your prompt assistance in resolving this matter.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days. Thank you for your patience during this process.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and there are no further issues. Please let us know if you need any additional help.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing your refund case. Feel free to reach out anytime if you have more questions or need further assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to help us improve our service. We appreciate your time and feedback.
